resources.string: Are you a real Potterhead?\n Let\'s find out!
This quiz is based upon all events from the Harry Potter books by their author, J.K. Rowling. Do not expect to know all the answers if you\'ve only watched the movies!
Select the teachers who taught Harry:
Who is unanimously elected leader of Dumbledore\'s Army?
What do Ron and Hermione use to destroy Helga Hufflepuff\'s cup?
What does Harry dream about during the summer holiday before his fifth year?
